problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,BE平分∠ABC,CE平分∠ACB,BE和CE交于点E,过点E作MN∥BC交AB于点M,交AC于点N．若MN=8,则BM+CN的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BE bisects ∠ABC, CE bisects ∠ACB, BE and CE intersect at point E, cross point E as MN ∥ BC crosses AB at point M, and crosses AC at point N. If MN = N_0, then the length of BM + CN is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查等腰三角形的判定,利用平行线的性质和角平分线的定义得到角相等是解题的关键
